scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/sidebar dist/icons dist/fonts dist/phosphor/regular dist/phosphor/bold dist/phosphor/duotone dist/phosphor/fill && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ && cp -r fonts/* dist/fonts/ && cp popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && cp sidebar/sidebar.html dist/sidebar/ && cp sidebar/sidebar.css dist/sidebar/ && cp node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/regular/style.css node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/regular/Phosphor.woff2 node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/regular/Phosphor.woff node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/regular/Phosphor.ttf dist/phosphor/regular/ && cp node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/bold/style.css node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/bold/Phosphor-Bold.woff2 node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/bold/Phosphor-Bold.woff node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/bold/Phosphor-Bold.ttf dist/phosphor/bold/ && cp node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/duotone/style.css node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/duotone/Phosphor-Duotone.woff2 node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/duotone/Phosphor-Duotone.woff node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/duotone/Phosphor-Duotone.ttf dist/phosphor/duotone/ && cp node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/fill/style.css node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/fill/Phosphor-Fill.woff2 node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/fill/Phosphor-Fill.woff node_modules/@phosphor-icons/web/src/fill/Phosphor-Fill.ttf dist/phosphor/fill/
